Amanda Green

Technical Project Manager

Amanda Green is currently a Technical Project Manager at Red Ventures on the Education vertical. In 2014, Amanda began working as a Web Publisher at a small startup company called Consumer Media Network (CMN) which ran lead gen for a portfolio of sites. In 2016, CMN became Higher Education and turned its focus to audiences looking for an online education and distance degree options.

In 2021, Amanda transitioned to a TPM role supporting RVEDU's Data teams. Amanda first started coding as a young teen, building geocities pages for her many characters featured in the unfinished works of fiction written over the following decades.
